reason:
MISSING DEPENDENCY DECLARATIONS AND STRUCTURAL DEFICIENCY IN DEFERRED ARGUMENTS. Node 1.3 defers the general n >= 2 unramified case to children 1.3.1 and 1.3.2, but does not declare explicit dependencies on any other nodes. It should declare dependencies on:

(1) The Matringe-Miyauchi essential Whittaker function theory (external reference "Matringe essential Whittaker" and "Miyauchi newforms") for the claim W^circ(I_{n+1}) != 0.
(2) The Bernstein-Zelevinsky theory for the Kirillov model embedding S(F^{n-1}\{0}) -> K(pi, psi).

Additionally, the structural relationship between 1.3 and its children is poorly specified: Node 1.3 claims "the integral is a nonzero monomial in q^{-s}" for the unramified case but defers all substance to 1.3.1 and 1.3.2. The parent thus makes a claim whose truth depends entirely on the children, yet the children (1.3.1 and 1.3.2) both have multiple open critical challenges (3 on 1.3.1, 4 on 1.3.2) including the K-projection dilemma (ch-8a091889d3a on 1.3.2) which, if upheld, would refute the entire unramified case strategy. The parent should note that its Case 2 claim is conditional on resolution of these child challenges.
